entry.title: Thursday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 19.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness after midnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 19. Wind chill minus 13 this evening and minus 28 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Thursday 02 March 2023

entry.title: Friday: Clearing. High minus 7.
